```{r}
library(limma)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
# load data
eset_symbol <- read.table('/nfs/scratch/gene_signature/eset_symbol.txt')
metadata <- readxl::read_xlsx('data/transcritome_patients_translated.xlsx')
metadata <- metadata[metadata$LOCATION!="Ctrl",]

rownames(metadata) <- gsub('.CEL', '', metadata$CEL_FILE)
colnames(eset_symbol) <- gsub(".*P_", "P_", colnames(eset_symbol))

eset_symbol <- eset_symbol[,rownames(metadata)]
```
## DEG between M0~M6
```{r}
# design matrix
design <- model.matrix(~0 + LOCATION, data = metadata)
fit1 <- lmFit(eset_symbol, design)
colnames(design)

# contrast
contrast.matrix <- makeContrasts(M0_M6 = LOCATIONM0 - LOCATIONM6,
                               levels=design)
fit2 <- contrasts.fit(fit1, contrast.matrix)
fit2 <- eBayes(fit2)

top_gene <- topTable(fit2, adjust.method = "BH")
results <- decideTests(fit2)
print(top_gene)
```
## DEG between NR~R
```{r}

## DEG between NR~R [M0]

# contrast between NR~R [M0]

                               levels=design)

fit2 <- eBayes(fit2)

top_gene <- topTable(fit2, adjust.method = "BH")
results <- decideTests(fit2)
print(top_gene)
```
